title: PT. Pulau Sambu
subtitle: DAF System
description: Dissolved Air Flotation (DAF) system installation for industrial wastewater treatment.
fullDescription: PT Toolmate Technologies Indonesia implemented a Dissolved Air Flotation (DAF) system for PT. Pulau Sambu at Guntung. The DAF system is designed to remove suspended solids, oils, and other contaminants from industrial wastewater through the flotation process, ensuring compliance with environmental standards.
